Subject: Looking for feedback on Heritrix remote control

I've put together notes on remote control of Heritrix on this wiki page: 
http://crawler.archive.org/cgi-bin/wiki.pl?JmxSurvey (Its linked to from 
the original JMX wiki page: 
http://crawler.archive.org/cgi-bin/wiki.pl?JmxControlStatus).  I'm 
mainly soliciting feedback on what needs to be added to our remote 
control facility and when.  The notes I've written do not assume 
foreknowledge of JMX, the mechanism we're to build remote control atop.

Thanks,
St.Ack
